title: Brussels
description: 3-day trip to Brussels exploring Belgian culture, art museums, and the heart of European politics

points.name: FR2929 (Ryanair)
points.description: Ryanair flight from Porto to Brussels

points.name: Grand Place
points.description: Huge city square completely encircled by elegant historic buildings dating back to the 14th century.

points.name: Manneken Pis
points.description: Iconic 17th-century fountain with a bronze statue of small boy, dressed in costume during festivals.

points.name: Church of Our Lady of Victories at the Sablon
points.address: Rue de la R√©gence 3B, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
points.description: This 15th-century Catholic church is known for its baroque chapels & Gothic architecture.

points.name: Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium
points.address: Rue de la R√©gence 3, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
points.description: Complex of museums with over 20,000 works tracing the history of painting, sculpture & drawing.

points.name: Magritte Museum
points.address: Rue de la R√©gence 3, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
points.description: Chronologically organized art museum with works by Ren√© Magritte & artifacts exploring his life.

points.name: Royal Palace of Brussels
points.description: Palace of the constitutional monarchy, with throne & other state rooms open for tours each summer.

points.name: Mount of the Arts
points.description: Small downtown area on a hill, with a landscaped garden, museums, and notable architecture.

points.name: Atomium
points.description: Giant stainless steel atom, particles connected by escalators, with exhibitions & views from 92m.

points.name: Mini-Europe
points.description: Miniature park with Europe's landmarks created on a scale of 1:25, from Big Ben to the Eiffel Tower.

points.name: St. Michael & St. Gudula Cathedral
points.description: Belgium's national church, host to royal weddings & funerals, built in the Brabant Gothic style.

points.name: Royal Gallery of Saint Hubert
points.description: This ornate shopping center under an arched glass roof offers high-end shops, eateries & theaters.

points.name: Parlamentarium
points.description: European Parliament visitor center with interactive exhibits about European democracy.

points.name: Parc du Cinquantenaire
points.description: Landscaped 19th-century city park with floral gardens & fountains, home to art & military museums.

points.name: Le Botanique
points.description: Cultural center in a former botanical glasshouse, with regular concerts, art exhibitions & theater.

points.name: Train World
points.description: Museum in Schaarbeek station featuring 20+ locomotives & exhibits on Belgian railroad history.

points.name: Comics Art Museum
points.description: Comic-book museum with original artwork & reading room, set in Victor Horta's art nouveau warehouse.

points.name: Brussels Town Hall
points.description: 1400s town hall with intricate Gothic facade & tower, plus tapestries & a mirrored concert hall.

points.name: Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences
points.description: Museum of natural history, from minerals to dinosaurs & animal specimens, with hands-on exhibits.

points.name: Jeanneke Pis
points.address: Impasse de la Fid√©lit√© 10-12, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
points.description: Statue of a young girl, considered by some to be the sister monument to the well-known Manneken Pis.

points.name: Zinneke Pis
points.description: Part of a trio of 'urinating' statues, this one depicts a dog lifting his leg on a post.

points.name: FR2928 (Ryanair)
points.description: Ryanair flight from Brussels back to Porto
